column4: it is the first time i come here without an issue with my ubuntu ! please tell me your problems !
tis a monumental day for you then.. :)
why do you mock me ? you are an ubuntu master ? :)
wasn't mocking you at all, it's a good thing the first time you come here to try and help, rather than be helped... i didn't mean that in a mocking manner at all.
yes i know i was joking too once i talked with a guy who used linux since 1998 i wondered if it was you
... i've been using it about that long.. but i don't recall ever chatting w/ you.. but im glad you've got everything going.
so you come and help people here everyday ? do you know some people managing the ubuntuforums ?
i'm here almost every day, yes, i don't hang out on the forums to often, so no.. i dont know anyone who manages the forums
i ask that to you because now to see the forum you absolutelity have to login !! it is a real nightmare
maybe you know somebody who know somebody you see ?
i have a forum account, but.. i don't post there to often... (i prefer helping "live" here in the channel) i probably have less 100 posts there
you mean the direct functionality in ubuntu to create a startup cd ?
?..y ou went from asking me about the forums, to direct functionality oof ubuntu to create a startup cd... you lost me
well thats a relief, i was lost
ok i said i was looking for the people managing the ubuntuforums to ask them why now you have to login to see posts
dunno, i'm sure they have their reasons though..
i suppose they have their reason so never mind i'll try to post directly on the forum to know more
